name: ns-tracing-server
description: Local server for viewing ns-tracing recordings

scripts.build: tsc && node esbuild.frontend.mjs && npx tailwindcss -i src/frontend/app.css -o public/css/viewer.css --minify
scripts.build:frontend: node esbuild.frontend.mjs && npx tailwindcss -i src/frontend/app.css -o public/css/viewer.css --minify
scripts.dev: concurrently "tsx --watch src/server.ts" "node esbuild.frontend.mjs --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i src/frontend/app.css -o public/css/viewer.css --watch"
